for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    if n == 1:
        print(1)
        continue
    odd = sum([1 for x in a if x % 2])
    print(odd % 2 + 1)

n = int(input())
for i in range(n):
    if int(input()) == 1:
        a = list(map(int, input().split()))
        del a
        print(1)
        continue
    print(int(not sum(list(map(int, input().split()))) % 2 == 0) + 1)
